title: Neodice
author: Neodice
content: As you already understood, we are a new platform that is only at the initial stage of its development. This week will be the finished integration of the automated bidding feature and we have been thinking about contests in this forum. That's why we're here and want to know which weekly contests you think would be interesting! Friends do you have any ideas related to dice game that you would like to see? We would appreciate any constructive feedback.Quote

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: I don't think there's many contests can be created on dice game.The classic one is the most wagered and I think every dice sites have this promotion. I've been thinking if there's a promotion for lucky gambler that can hit 7 streak win by placing his bets with low chance to win e.g. 10%.Well I checked your casino, but why we can't adjust which number we're gamble since it's only have under and over button.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: I think the classic thing was hitting a specific number like 77.77 or 0.1 and the list goes on, that's what I'm thinking. A prediction on how many bets have already taken place in a specific date was likely a good contest too, you can also create an art contests or something, just my two cents.

Of course, with some symbolic prizes. Well, I am looking forward to seeing that auto betting and your setting... comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: It's a simple game so it's difficult to find other ways to promote it such as contests. Before, I saw Yolodice who offers prizes to those who wagered the most. Top 1, 2, and 3 will have the higher rewards, and then 4-10 with the same amount. For every cryptocurrency, there is a top wager. Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Doge. That means 40 winners weekly, iirc.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Wagering contest is the most important thing for a dice betting site. You should run some weekly wagering contest as Neodice is new to the gambling world and users wagering activity is very low there. Moreover, you should follow the weekly forum giveaways of Primedice. You may create similar type weekly giveaway for Neodice users, but don't copy their rules. You may start with highest multiplier challenge or most consecutive win streak challenge on 3×, 5×, 9× multiplier.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: Well, Dice is a bit limited... but if you are tracking all bets... I would put up a few numbers and see who falls on that Bet ID.... for example ... if your total amount of bets are currently 10 000 000 bets... then I will say anyone that have bets falling between 10 500 000 and 10 500 100 will each get $50 ...... or you can have bigger prizes... for example $500 for the person that have the bet ID of say $11 000 000. This way, people have to push the bets to reach those bet ID's and depending on your bet volume.. you could make it much higher ...say every 1 000 000 bets get a prize.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: There are some contest you can do on the forum:Biggest multiplier race:1.-Set a min. amount for the race.2.-Biggest multiplier with the biggest amount win the fist price.3.-Prices for 10 users.Free coins for new users.Offer a bonus for new users with a rollover of x30 to withdraw. This will attract new users, but you need to find a way to avoid cheaters and multi-accounts on this.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: how about giving $100 for users who bet <50> and exactly got the result of 50. i think this will keep them betting all day. maybe make it more than a $100.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: I'd suggest running regular contests that are more specific and similar to what Mahdirakib mentioned instead of going for the usual wagering contests so that every type of gambler would be encouraged to participate plus it'll be more challenging.I also support Kakmakr's suggestion with the betid contest even though it's a common contest done by several casinos it's still one of the fun ones and it'll be a good contest as I see your betid is close to 2 million.

comments.author: Reid
comments.body: Wagering amounts had always been the best contest ever when it comes to dice. It will boost the amount of players online and the number of bettors per second/minutes. Let a percentage of the amount they bet put in one storage or a bank and divide that for giving out prizes for those who gamble more. If you have an automated roll included, I am sure the site will be flooded with more dicers that will try to reach the top prize.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: As said few times above, the most common contest that can be applied inside the site is a wagering contest since it is the most easiest contest to track. Other alternative can be something like "the most profit" contest or maybe "ROI" contest. If you are going to have the contest in the forum, you have more options as you can run some various contests such as hitting specific numbers, specific multiplier, longest winning/losing streak with specific payout, etc. Wagering contest is not my thing because I'm a small gambler only, so I will prefer to other contests.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: The most common contests is wagering, profit with high odds, exact number 7.77 or 77.77, winning streak. I would like to see a different competition but with two challenges in one challenge, I mean the right high odds but more than two winning streak for example x10 won and so on x10 won again, the challenge will be more interesting and difficult. But it is better to focus on wagering contests only, of course with big prizes, will attract interest more gamblers. A free faucet is recommended, so that many people are active on your site.

comments.body: Dice sites that I know of usually had those wagering contests for their promotion and it's effective from what I saw.Another one that I can think of is for a winner that will roll the one millionth roll or any sort of that. I guess many will be come and quick and try to be active as much as they can if the prize seems attractive.That will make you hit the very first million roll too quick if that's the contest.
